entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Lloydminster
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:45 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -9.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lloydminster Airport 06:09 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -9.2°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -10.4°C
Wind: SSE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Fog dissipating late this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this morning. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023
